languages.text: "Люди, сопровождавшие Теодору в путешествиях, странным образом ничего не знают про "Инцидент" и "Эпитафию".
"The people who accompanied Theodora on her travels are strangely unaware of the Incident and Epitaph."
languages.original_text: "Люди, сопровождавшие Теодору в путешествиях, странным образом ничего не знают про "Инцидент" и "Эпитафию".

traits.locale_text: "The people who accompanied Theodora on her travels are strangely unaware of the Incident and Epitaph."
"The people who accompanied Theodora on her travels are strangely unaware of the Incident and Epitaph."
"The people who accompanied Theodora on her travels are strangely unaware of the Incident and Epitaph."
"The people who accompanied Theodora on her travels are strangely unaware of the Incident and Epitaph."

languages.text: «La gente que acompañaba a Theodora en sus viajes parece no estar al tanto del incidente ni de Epitafio».
languages.original_text: "The people who accompanied Theodora on her travels are strangely unaware of the Incident and Epitaph."

traits.locale_text: «La gente que acompañaba a Theodora en sus viajes parece no estar al tanto del incidente ni de Epitafio».

languages.text: 「シオドーラの旅に同行した者たちは、不思議なことに事件やエピタフのことを知らないと言っている」
languages.original_text: "The people who accompanied Theodora on her travels are strangely unaware of the Incident and Epitaph."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラの旅に同行した者たちは、不思議なことに事件やエピタフのことを知らないと言っている」

languages.text: “当初陪同西奥多拉前往荒垄碑碣的人，却并不了解那起事故与荒垄碑碣本身，这很古怪。”
languages.original_text: "The people who accompanied Theodora on her travels are strangely unaware of the Incident and Epitaph."

traits.locale_text: “当初陪同西奥多拉前往荒垄碑碣的人，并不了解拿起事故与荒垄碑碣本身，这很古怪。”

languages.text: « Étrangement, les gens qui accompagnaient Théodora dans ses voyages ne savent rien au sujet de l'incident et d'Épitaphe. »
languages.original_text: "The people who accompanied Theodora on her travels are strangely unaware of the Incident and Epitaph."

traits.locale_text: « Étrangement, les gens qui accompagnaient Théodora dans ses voyages ne savent rien au sujet de l'incident et d'Épitaphe. »

languages.text: "Die Menschen, die Theodora auf ihren Reisen begleitet haben, wissen merkwürdigerweise nichts von dem Vorfall und von Epitaph."
languages.original_text: "The people who accompanied Theodora on her travels are strangely unaware of the Incident and Epitaph."

traits.locale_text: "Die Menschen, die Theodora auf ihren Reisen begleitet haben, wissen merkwürdigerweise nichts von dem Vorfall und von Epitaph."

languages.text: "Tuhaftır ki Theodora'ya seyahatlerinde eşlik edenler, Hadise'den ve Sinyazıt'tan habersizler."
languages.original_text: "The people who accompanied Theodora on her travels are strangely unaware of the Incident and Epitaph."

traits.locale_text: "Tuhaftır ki Theodora'ya seyahatlerinde eşlik edenler, Hadise'den ve Kitabe'den habersizler."
